text: Ahrweiler () is a district in the north of Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. Its capital is Bad Neuenahr-Ahrweiler. The Rhine forms the eastern border of the district. Ahrweiler is located in the northernmost part of the Eifel mountains. == Towns and municipalities == Towns Verbandsgemeinden #Bad Neuenahr-Ahrweiler #Remagen #Sinzig Free municipality #Grafschaft *1.
